head.title: BROADBASE SOFTWARE AGREES TO PURCHASE PANOP.COM

hedline.hl1: BROADBASE SOFTWARE AGREES TO PURCHASE PANOP.COM

abstract.p: Broadbase Software Inc announces its agreement to pay about $107.7 million in stock for closely held Panop.com Inc (S)

block.p: Broadbase Software Inc. said yesterday that it had agreed to pay around $107.7 million in stock for the privately held Panop.com Inc., which makes software that recommends products to online shoppers. Under terms of the deal, Broadbase, an analytical applications maker, will issue about 3.18 million shares of its common stock, options and warrants in exchange for all securities of Panop.com. Panop.com, which is based in Palo Alto, Calif., makes software that produces contextual personalized recommendations to shoppers on the Internet. Broadbase's software analyzes customer information to help Internet businesses improve service.
